content: Singaporean lawyer (1937–2020) **Harry Elias** (4 May 1937 – 26 August 2020) was a Singaporean veteran lawyer and [Senior Counsel](/wiki/Senior_Counsel). One of Singapore's best litigation lawyers, he was made a Senior Counsel in 1997.[*excessive citations*] Elias was instrumental in founding the Criminal Legal Aid Scheme, and also founded the eponymous firm, Harry Elias Partnership LLP. Elias died after a long illness on 26 August 2020 at the age of 83. This Singapore law-related biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Harry Elias
